SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model_view

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model_view.GameView
public class GameView extends Object
General client's copy of the game model, contains general info about the game and the reference to other model view elements.
